bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Marine Cable for Use on Shipboard and Fixed or Floating Facilities
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Marine Cable for Use on Shipboard and Fixed or Floating Facilities
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1580/D2, Sept 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Requirements are given for single or multiconductor cables, with or without metal armor and/or jacket, and rated 300 V to 35 kV, intended to be installed aboard marine vessels, fixed and floating offshore facilities, and in accordance with industry installation standards and the regulations of the authorities having jurisdiction (AHJ).

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
